Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about Phoenix Casino Goa

Welcome to our FAQ section where we've compiled answers to the most common questions about Phoenix Casino Goa. If you can't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to contact us directly.

No matching questions found. Please try a different search term.

Are children allowed in Phoenix casino goa?

Children are not allowed in the gaming area. They are allowed in the restaurant area only.

Is there any charge for children below 21 at Phoenix casino goa?

There is no extra charge for children below 21. Food and beverages are free for them. They are allowed only in restaurant area.

Are guests allowed to carry bag in Phoenix casino in goa?

Only small handbags after checking are allowed inside the casino. No luggage bags allowed.

What are the timings of Phoenix casino goa?

Casino is open 24x7.

Do we need to carry a photo ID for entry in Phoenix casino goa?

Yes, a government photo ID - Aadhar card/Driving license/Passport is required for age proof.

What's the entry fee for Phoenix casino?

Minimum entry is Rs 2000 for stag and Rs 3000 for couple.

What's the minimum bet at or required in Phoenix casino?

Different games have different criteria. Ranging from 500 minimum to 1000 bet.

Can I arrange an event in Phoenix casino?

For all gaming and celebrity related events, please message at marketing@phoenixcasino.in

What's special in Phoenix casino?

Phoenix casino is one of the best casinos in Goa in terms of its luxurious ambience, good service and delicious food.

What's the USP of Phoenix casino of goa?

Our USP is our luxurious ambience with a special Hukkah Bar area.

Why should I/we go to Phoenix casino?

One of the most luxurious and new casinos in Goa. A must visit for the casino lovers to experience great gaming, excellent service, friendly environment, luxurious ambience and scrumptious food.

What are the games available in Phoenix casino?

All range of card and machine games available like roulette, spintec roulette, slot machines, baccarat, blackjack, Andar-Bahar, three-card poker etc.

Does Phoenix casino conduct celebrity events?

Regular events are being conducted in Phoenix Casino. Kumar Shanu, Sonal Chauhan, Desi Shah, Inaayat Sharma, and Urvashi Routela have graced the floors with their dazzling presence.

Is there any special package for couple?

Special couple packages are available ranging from 3000, 5000 to 10000 per couple entry charges with extra OTPCs.

Is there any special discounts available on weekends in Phoenix casino?

Phoenix Casino follows same packages all through the week.

Is there a kid's room in Phoenix Casino?

No we do not have kids room as of yet.

Is there restaurant available in Phoenix casino?

Yes we have a dedicated restaurant cum bar area for guests to fulfil their food and beverages requirements. Restaurant also has a stage where every evening dance performances are held.

Is there Hukka bar/room available for guests in Phoenix casino goa?

Yes there is a special Hukka bar. The facilities can be availed on extra charges.

Still have questions?

If you couldn't find the answer to your question, feel free to reach out to us directly.
